#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    int x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3,x4,y4,area,area3=0;
    cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2>>x3>>y3>>x4>>y4;
    int area1=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
    int area2=(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
    x1=max(x1,x3);
    y1=max(y1,y3);
    x2=min(x2,x4);
    y2=min(y2,y4);
    if((x1<=x2)&&(y1<=y2))
        area3=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
    area=area1+area2-area3;
    cout<<area<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
